Posts.author: JBon
Posts.title: A5 is Due Tonight
Posts.text: Lets bring all of our Story Boards to tomorrows meeting. We can review them, make edits if needed, and then work on the Paper Prototypes together. Fill out this strawpull to figure out what time we can meet: http://www.strawpoll.me/
